text:
Katerina’s Struggle

A dimly lit room, tension rising.  
Katerina is overwhelmed and breathless.  
Katerina: “Polenka, run to Sonia! Hurry!”  

Raskolnikov washes blood from Marmeladov’s face.  
Raskolnikov: “I shouldn’t have brought him here.”  

---
The room is packed with anxious onlookers.  
Katerina’s fury erupts.  
Katerina: “Let him die in peace, at least!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Katerina Ivanovna struggles to manage the chaos and concern surrounding her injured husband, Marmeladov, while Raskolnikov attempts to assist.
